definition: medicine to be taken after being mixed with water (or other liquid)
thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash
(of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with

sentences.english: So it has certain anti senile effect in brain.
sentences.chinese: 提示，健脑益肾冲剂具有一定的抗脑衰作用。

sentences.english: The Liganshu granules have the preventive effect on immune liver injury in mice.
sentences.chinese: 利肝舒冲剂对小鼠免疫性肝损伤有预防作用。

sentences.english: Colormetric method was used to determine the content of Flavonoids in Xintongning Granule.
sentences.chinese: 采用比色法对心痛宁冲剂中总黄酮的含量进行测定。

sentences.english: Conclusion Cholagogue dry syrup can decrease the lithogenic tendency of bile.
sentences.chinese: 结论利胆冲剂能有效降低胆汁的成石趋势。

sentences.english: To compare with the side effect of the Chinese medicine-"Choudongling Granule" and that of western medicine - Tiapride.
sentences.chinese: 中药抽动停冲剂与西药硫酸泰必利副作用的比较。

sentences.english: Methods The content of soluble Polysaccharide was determined by spectrophotometry at the wavelength of 486 nm.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立测定参芪补血冲剂多糖的含量的方法。

sentences.english: The buffering principle and application of buffering agent were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 着重叙述了缓冲剂原理及应用。

sentences.english: In the control group, 18 patients were treated with SPESE alone.
sentences.chinese: 对照组18例，只口服琥珀消石冲剂。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a quantity standard for Kechuanning Chongji.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立咳喘宁冲剂的质量标准。

sentences.english: Conclusion This study provided a basis for the quality control of Xiaochaihu granules.
sentences.chinese: 结论本研究为小柴胡冲剂的质量控制提供了依据。

sentences.english: Conclusions Naogengling granule can effectively treat cerebral infarction.
sentences.chinese: 结论脑梗灵冲剂治疗脑梗死疗效确切。

sentences.english: Milk or milk powder granule 1 cup.
Conclusion It is indicated that anti-fatty liver dilution agent is safe and hasnt toxicity.
sentences.chinese: 结论表明抗脂肪肝冲剂，其急性毒性试验安全无毒。

sentences.english: I just take a capsule, but you can take it in powder form if you prefer.
sentences.chinese: 我吃的是胶囊，你也可以使用冲剂。

sentences.english: To evaluate the therapeutic effect of Bushen Zhuanggu Granule (BZG) for menopausal osteoporosis (MO) .
sentences.chinese: 客观评价补肾壮骨冲剂治疗绝经后骨质疏松症的疗效。

sentences.english: Also, an estrogen activity experiment was adopted in some young oophorectomized rats.
sentences.chinese: 对切除卵巢的幼龄大鼠作本冲剂的雌激素活性实验。

definition: indigo woad root/root of Isatis tinctoria (used in TCM)
antipyretic tablet (to reduce fever), such as sulfanilamide
